```python
def transform(sequence):
    first_non_zero_index = next((i for i, x in enumerate(sequence) if x != '0'), None)
    first_zero_after_non_zero_index = next((i for i, x in enumerate(sequence[first_non_zero_index:]) if x == '0'), None) + first_non_zero_index
